javax.el

Class ELResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.el.ELResolver
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ArrayELResolver, BeanELResolver, CompositeELResolver, ImplicitObjectELResolver, ListELResolver, MapELResolver, ResourceBundleELResolver, ScopedAttributeELResolver

    public abstract class ELResolver
extends java.lang.Object
    Resolves variables and properties in EL expressions.
    Since:
    2.1

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String RESOLVABLE_AT_DESIGN_TIME
      FeatureDescriptor property indicating whether the variable or property can be resolved at compile time.
      static java.lang.String TYPE
      FeatureDescriptor property indicating the class of the variable or property.
